name: SparkFBT – WooCommerce Frequently Bought Together
author: SparkPlugins

sections.description:
Amazon-style up & cross sells using smart product bundles. Make it effortless for your customers to buy your Frequently Bought Together products using actual data of your WooCommerce shop.

Key Features

  • Product Recommendations: Automatically recommend related products based on what other customers have bought, increasing the likelihood of cross-selling and upselling opportunities.
  • Customization Options: Tailor the appearance and behavior of the products to match your website's design and preferences.
  • Next, Next, Finish: Build up your first recommendation with the helpful wizard, which guides you through the process of creating a new product promotion
  • Responsive Design: The plugin is fully responsive, including the admin area, ensuring a seamless browsing and managing experience across all devices and screen sizes.
  • And many more: Just try it out for free and we promise that we won’t let you down!

Want even more features?

Get SparkFBT PRO

  • Unlimited number of FBT sections to be created.
  • Unlimited number of locations to show a Frequently Bought Together section.
  • Show a Frequently Bought Together products carousel
  • Analytics on the performance of your FBT section(s)

Part of SparkWoo

Together, these plugins create a unified base that enhances your webshop’s marketing capabilities. sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option — WordPress will handle the file transfer, and you won’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of SparkFBT, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu, and click “Add New.”

In the search field type “SparkFBT” then click “Search Plugins.” Once you’ve found us, you can view details about it such as the point release, rating, and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by Clicking “Install Now” and WordPress will take it from there.

Manual installation

Manual installation method requires downloading the SparkFBT plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

Automatic updates should work smoothly, but we still recommend you back up your site.
sections.faq:
What is SparkFBT, and what does it do?

SparkFBT is a WooCommerce Frequently Bought Together plugin. It is a powerful tool designed to help online store owners display a list of products frequently bought together on their WooCommerce websites. It allows customers to conveniently visit products others have bought together, enhancing their shopping experience.

How does the plugin work?

The plugin works by showing the products on a product detail page that are frequently bought together with that product. On the cart page it will show products that are frequently bought together with products in the cart. There is also a shortcode that you can easily add to your store's pages.

Can I customize the appearance of the frequently bought together?

Yes, you can! SparkFBT provides various customization options, such as choosing the number of products to display, adjusting the appearance and configuring the design to match your store's.

Is the plugin compatible with my WooCommerce theme?

The plugin is designed to be compatible with most WooCommerce themes. However, if you encounter any compatibility issues, our support team is here to assist you in resolving them.

Does SparkFBT work with variable products?

Yes, the plugin is fully compatible with variable products. It will display the recently viewed variations of a product if the customer has viewed them.

Will the plugin slow down my website?

No, the plugin is optimized for performance and will not significantly impact your website's loading speed. We've ensured that it operates efficiently to provide a seamless shopping experience.

Does the free version of the plugin have limitations compared to the PRO version?

Yes, the free version comes with basic functionality. The PRO version offers advanced features like analytics on conversion and clicks and showing the products in a carousel. Check our website for more info.

How do I upgrade from the free version to the PRO version?

Upgrading is easy! Simply purchase the PRO version from our website and follow the installation instructions provided. Your data from the free version will be seamlessly transferred.
